name: Datelist – Online Reservation System
author: Datelist

sections.description:
Datelist is the online booking system you need.
Allow your customers and prospects to easily book an appointment, whatever your profession, from your website.

Datelist supports:

  • Booking schedule management
  • The management of several calendars, with limited places
  • Online payment with Stripe
  • Sending notifications by SMS and Email before an appointment
  • The synchronization of appointments with your calendar (Google or Microsoft)

Note: The use of the Datelist plugin requires a registration to our product on https://datelist.io.
This plugin contains only help information to install the plugin.
sections.installation:
Add the Datelist plugin and follow the instructions of the plugin.
Then add the HTML code snippet containing the integration information, and you’re done!
Contact us at contact@datelist.io for free support
